Package hu.bme.mit.theta.common.visualization

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.bme.mit.theta.common.visualization.Graph
  • public final class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a graph for visualization purposes. It has nodes, composite nodes and directed edges.

    • Constructor Summary
